title: Moving Blocks in the Block Editor
description: Read through the blocks in the editor. Then move the blocks so the phrases are in the correct order and run the program.
hint:
Move the blocks so that the statements go in numbered order. Using the mouse, click and drag each block up or down to reorder them. Once you have them in order press the run button.

Using the keyboard, TAB over to the editor and press ENTER. Next, arrow to the editor and press ENTER. Then use the up and down arrow keys to navigate through each line of code. Use the cut hotkey on the line you are moving and move to its new line to paste the block. Finally, run the program using CTRL + SHIFT + R or go to the run button using SHIFT + ENTER, ESC, and SHIFT + TAB to navigate back to the toolbar.
